chapters.summary: Emily Kwang is recording shortwave from NPR headquarters. The US is close to officially declaring that Cove has claimed the lives of a million people in this country. Many of these COVID-19 deaths were preventable, according to a study from the Brown School of Public Health and Microsoft AI for health.

chapters.summary: There were 3190 deaths from Covet after vaccines were open to all adults in the US last year. Only about 30% of kids aged 5 to 11 are fully vaccinated. Social media is to blame for the rise of anti-vaxxer sentiment on social media.

chapters.summary: Influencers are promoting antivaccine messages on social media. Lydia Green is a mother of three children. She is trying to form a support group called Camaraderie for people who have fallen for the anti vaccine propaganda. Back to the Back is on a mission to connect families with sciencebacked, evidence.
